title: Coronavirus: How Covid-19 is denying dignity to the dead in Italy
description: Funerals have been banned in Italy - robbing many families of the chance to say a final goodbye.
content:
Image copyrightJilla DastmalchiImage caption
 "We put the clothes the family gives us on top of the corpse, as if they were dressed"
Italy has banned funerals because of the coronavirus crisis. For many, the virus is now robbing families of the chance to sa… [+6335 chars]
